title: Elastic Common Schema (ECS) Service
description: The Service fields describe the service for or from which the data was collected.

name.description: Name of the service data is collected from.

type.description: The type of the service data is collected from.

node.description: This allows for two nodes of the same service running on the same host to be differentiated.

name.description: The `service.node.name` should typically be unique across nodes of a given service.
